title: IClearanceVerificationMgr.IgnoreClearanceEqualToSpecifiedValue
description: Gets or sets whether to ignore clearances equal to or greater than IClearanceVerificationMgr::GetMinimumAcceptableClearance.
returns: True to ignore clearances equal to or greater than the specified value, false to not
remarks:
If this property is true, use
IClearanceVerificationMgr::SetMinimumAcceptableClearance
to specify the minimum clearance value, at or above which clearances are ignored.
